summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the construction of certain of the additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing water supply system of the City of Seattle, specified and adopted by Ordinance No. 37520 (as amended); ratifying, approving and confirming the action of the Board of Public Works in preparing and approving detailed plans and specifications therefor, and in calling for proposals for the construction of the same by contract; authorizing said Board of Public Works to proceed with the construction of such improvement by letting a contract therefor; making an appropriation to pay the cost and expense of such construction; (and declaring an emergency).
